directions.step:
Fill your glass or mug with as much orange juice as you wish. Pour this into blender; add vanilla, egg and banana broken into small pieces. Whirl until smooth and foamy.
Variations: Substitute apple or other juice for orange; Substitute milk for juice; Add 1 tb strawberry jam; Add 1/2 ts instant coffee.
